Articles.Content: Can anyone tell me how to manually update my 0.24.2 KSP to the .25 version. I use STEAM, and I chose to use the older version after the auto update in order to complete some missions and things. Now I wish to update but am unable to do it. Any help appreciated.
Opt out of the beta version and make sure its set to update and it should happen automaticly. steam treats old versions as beta.
